pages.title: Dawn in Porcelain
body: Morning light pours through the cracks like gold lacquer, rejoining pieces that once drifted apart.
Breathe in slowly. Each inhale traces the curve of a repaired vessel; each exhale presses the seam together.

pages.title: Drift Lanterns
body: Small lanterns balance on the ocean, carrying notes about where you paused last night.
Bookmarks are modern lanterns: quick anchors that remember your exact moment. Add them freely; they stay encrypted on this device.
Offline reading is a quiet harbor. When the signal drops, this library keeps every saved seam intact.

pages.title: Neon Rain
body: Rainy avenues mirror the neon skyline. You can pinch to zoom on the signage details without losing crispness.
Every page turn gently eases forward or back; history keeps a thread so you can jump through scenes.
Remember: encrypted storage protects your trail, and clearing history is only a tap away.
